column18: 09/21/1972: A letter bomb addressed to an official was discovered and defused at the Israeli Embassy in Kinshasa, Zaire. This was one of 74 letter bombs that were mailed from Amsterdam and were discovered or detonated between September 19, 1972 and September 28, 1972. Black September claimed responsibility for the incidents.
column127: \\"\"Death-by-Mail Drive Spreads to Israeli Embassy in Africa"
